tool.name: Preseq c_curve
tool.command:
## 1. File Preparation: Symlink the input BAM to a standard name ln -s '$input_bam' input.bam &&
## 2. c_curve Analysis Execute preseq c_curve -B input.bam $verbose -s $step_size #if $max_read_len: -l $max_read_len #end if -o '$output_tsv'

param.name: max_read_len
param.label: Maximum Read Length
param.help: Limits the length of reads considered. Leave empty for no limit.

tool.help:
**Preseq: c_curve**
Plots the number of distinct reads against the number of total reads. Useful for seeing if you have sequenced enough.
